title: "About"

I am the Statistical Project Manager for the Division of Lung Transplant in the [Department of Cardiothoracic Surgery](http://www.ctsurgery.pitt.edu/) at the University of Pittsburgh Medical Center. I have a Ph.D. in Psychology from [Georgia State University](http://www.gsu.edu), and am currently completing a Master's Degree in Statistical Data Science from [Texas A&M University](https://online.stat.tamu.edu/).
